def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 2):
        for x,y in permutations(config):
            check_xy_medium_grey = is_grey(x, ctx) and is_medium_size(x, ctx)
            check_y_half_size_x = is_smaller(y, x, ctx) and is_half_size(y, x, ctx)
            check_y_right_x = is_right(y, x, ctx)
            check_y_slightly_above_x = is_above(y, x, ctx) and get_distance(x, y, ctx) < get_minimum_radius(x, ctx)
            if (
                check_xy_medium_grey
                and check_y_half_size_x
                and check_y_right_x
                and check_y_slightly_above_x
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x,y]))
    return results
state = turn(state)
